member.name: T:SSIS.Test.Report.TestEngineExtensions
member.summary: A collection of extension methods for test engine.

member.name: M:SSIS.Test.Report.TestEngineExtensions.ExecuteLiveTestsWithGui(SSIS.Test.ILiveTestEngine,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a package and starts gui monitor.
member.param: Name of the repository where the package is loaded.

Name identifier of a package to execute. If a package is loaded from file system, the name corresponds to the package file name (e.g. MyPackageFile.dtsx). If a package is loaded from dts or sql server, the name must be the same as the name under which the package is saved on dts or sql server.

member.name: M:SSIS.Test.Report.TestEngineExtensions.ExecuteUnitTestsWithGui(SSIS.Test.IUnitTestEngine)
member.summary: Executes unit tests and starts gui monitor.

member.name: M:SSIS.Test.Report.TestEngineExtensions.SaveTestResultsAndCoverageAsHtml(SSIS.Test.IUnitTestEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the result and coverage of unit tests into a file.
member.param: Path to a file where data is saved. Any existing file will be overwriten.

member.name: M:SSIS.Test.Report.TestEngineExtensions.SaveTestResultsAndCoverageAsHtml(SSIS.Test.ILiveTestEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the result and coverage of live tests into a file.
member.param: Path to a file where data is saved. Any existing file will be overwriten.

member.param: Path to a file where data is saved. Any existing file will be overwriten.
